creator: BANK ZIMMERBERG AG
descriptionHtml:
The bank for mobile financial transactions.
Using Bank Zimmerberg's mobile banking app, you can check your finances at any time. Make the most of our wide range of e-banking services, whether you have a smartphone or tablet or not. It's simple and safe.
Overview of Bank Zimmerberg's mobile banking functions:

Finances
– Up-to-date overview of assets
– Account statements with entry details
– Portfolio statements with details of positions

Payments
– Account transfers
– Settle domestic or overseas invoices
– Domestic or overseas bank transfers
– Settle e-bills
– Manage pending payments
– Use payment templates and payment lists

Stock exchange trading
– Buy and sell securities
– Manage order book
– Stay informed at any time about the status of stock exchange orders and intervene if necessary
– View portfolio with current holdings incl. performance

Services
– Secure communication with Bank Zimmerberg
– Emergency numbers to block cards
– Current and important notifications

Payment scanner
It's never been easier to execute payments. No more typing in reference numbers. Use your smartphone camera to scan documents easily and execute payments immediately.

Requirements
Bank Zimmerberg's mobile app is only for Bank Zimmerberg customers with an address in Switzerland. To log in to the app, you need your contract number and a mobile banking password. You can set and change this in the e-banking section of Bank Zimmerberg, under Settings. You can also select in Settings whether transactions (payments/stock exchange) are permitted or not.

Security
The security of your data is our highest priority. This is why your data is transmitted encrypted. When you first activate the app, there is also a device registration process for your e-banking contract. Please play your part in maintaining security and comply with the following security recommendations:
– Never leave your smartphone unattended.
– Use a strong password and keep it secret.
– Do not save login details such as contract numbers and passwords on your mobile device.
– When in public, always conceal your login details while entering them.
– Always log out completely once you have finished using the mobile banking app.
– Use the latest version of the Bank Zimmerberg mobile banking app and operating system.
– Activate the code lock for your device.
descriptionShort: The bank for mobile financial transactions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• New scanner for processing QR-bill and previous payment slips
• Small improvements and bug fixes

descriptionShort: The bank for mobile financial transactions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW FUNCTIONS (What’s new)

Our mobile banking app has been extensively revised and now has a new, clearer design.

Now you can start directly in the asset overview and have a quick overview of your finances. Entering payments is even easier thanks to the intelligent payment wizard. In addition, you now have the option of transferring payment slips directly to e-Banking using the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Simplified activation for new devices with QR code
• New design in the card module
• Geographical authorisation for debit cards now available similar to e-Banking
• Function 'Sign payments' available similar to e-Banking
• Background adjustments regarding the monthly exemption limit without transaction signature
• Small improvements and bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
•  Fix for scanner with Android 12
•  General bug fixes
•  ‘Total’ for pending payments available
•  Transaction text at the top of account entries

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Menüpunkt «e-Dokumente» neu verfügbar
• Auslandzahlungen neu möglich
• Relevante Informationen bei Transaktionsdetails zuoberst
• Pendente Zahlungen via Kontoauszug aufrufbar
• Total Pendente Zahlungen verfügbar
• Funktion ‘Kontonummer (IBAN) teilen unter den ‘Informationen’ verfügbar
• Optimierte Anzeige Debit Mastercard
• Diverse Optimierungen und allgemeine Fehlerkorrekturen
